EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Join us for our ongoing podcast series All Things Pivotal <http://www.pivotal.io/podcasts>. Every week we explore technology at the intersection of cloud, agile development and Big Data. Host Simon Elisha <https://twitter.com/simon_elisha>, will share the latest news, interview industry technologists, and explore how people are harnessing sophisticated data and cloud technologies to build applications that achieve extraordinary things.
Listen to our podcast episodes featuring data:
EPISODE #3: Comparing Big Data vs Fast Data Simon compares Big Data and a fast data. By demystifying and decoding these buzz words, he will give some realistic relevance to Big Data as it has evolved over the years. Listen Now
EPISODE #5: Interview with Ailey Crow at the Strata + Hadoop Conference Simon chats with Pivotal Senior Data Scientist, Ailey Crow, at this year's Strata + Hadoop Conference in New York on October 15-17. Listen Now <http://www.pivotal.io/podcasts>
Since podcasts are portable, we hope you’ll take the opportunity to download “All Things Pivotal” and listen whenever convenient. Subscribe here <http://www.pivotal.io/podcasts>.
Have a topic you would like to see covered? Share your feedback with us by email <mailto:podcast@pivotal.io>. Thanks!
The Pivotal Team
